previewPage.disclaimer: Refunds will be issued in {settlementCurrency} only. Exchange rates and fees are determined by PayPal and change frequently. All cryptocurrency transactions are final and cannot be reversed.
previewPage.pyusdNotice: This transaction will be completed using PayPal USD (PYUSD), a stablecoin issued by Paxos Trust Company, LLC and regulated by the New York State Department of Financial Services. PYUSD is backed by secure, highly liquid assets.

hints.conversionFee: PayPal charges this fee for cryptocurrency conversion services.
hints.transactionBuffer: This buffer amount helps ensure your purchase completes successfully, even with market fluctuations. Any unused amount remains in your PayPal balance.

payment.subtitle: Your funds will remain secure in your PayPal account. Please try again or contact PayPal support.

requestDenied.subtitle: Your request was declined by PayPal's security systems or your linked financial institution. Please verify your account or try a different payment method.

terms.linkText: PayPal User Agreement and Privacy Policy
terms.agreement: By continuing, you agree to PayPal's {termsLink}.

oauthStatusPage.title: Log into PayPal and authorize access
